accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. Use slate-600+ on white.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text. Import them in index.css.
Implement a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (left) and Header (top).
Use the 'Bento' grid system for dashboards: mix standard (1x1), wide (2x1), and tall (1x2) widgets.
For charts, use 'recharts' with the defined color palette. Do not use default colors.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
The 'AI Insights' panel should be a collapsible sidebar on the right.
Login page should use the 'login_bg' image with a glassmorphism card for the form.
Strictly follow the color palette. Do not use random hex codes.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic gradients or centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical (p-6, p-8).
Micro-interactions on every button and card.
Dark mode support is optional but structure should allow it (use slate-900 for dark bg).
